sen.j: 五情（ごじょう）は、中国で、5つの感情を意味する。
sen.e: In China, Gojyo refers to the five emotions.
In China, Gojo refers to five emotions.
sen.cmt: jyo→jo、fiveの前のtheを削除しました。
sen.e: In China, Gojo refers to five emotions.
Joy, Anger, Grief, Pleasure and Hate
Joy, Anger, Grief, Pleasure and Hate
Joy, Anger, Grief, Pleasure and Hate

sen.j: 五行説で喜は木に、怒は金に、哀は水に、楽は火に、怨は土に割り当てられる。
sen.e: In the Gogyo principle, Joy is represented as a tree, Anger as Gold, Sadness as Water, Pleasure as Fire, and Hate as Soil.
In the Gogyo (Five Movements) principle, Joy is represented as a tree, Anger as Gold, Sadness as Water, Pleasure as Fire, and Hate as Soil.
sen.cmt: Gogyoについて説明を加えました。
sen.e: In the Gogyo (Five Movements) principle, Joy is represented as a tree, Anger as Gold, Sadness as Water, Pleasure as Fire, and Hate as Soil.
